column5: Is Whiteshell Air, out of Lac DuBonnet, Manitoba, still in operation? Went with them one time 10 or more years ago. Seems to me they had reasonable rates back then. Like to take my son on a fly in - cost becomes a comcern when paying for more than one.
Yes. They can be reached at 204-345-8339.Carl L. WalManitoba Conservation
Any other info on Whiteshell Air? How are their lakes now? Have they improved any of their cabins?
